argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR /\ C e. CC ) -> C e. CC ) |

| 3 | 2 | #P_recnd | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR /\ C e. CC ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | #P_relogcl | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( log ` A ) e. RR ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR /\ C e. CC ) -> ( log ` A ) e. RR ) |

| 7 | 1, 3, 6 | #P_mulassd | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR /\ C e. CC ) -> ( ( C x. B ) x. ( log ` A ) ) = ( C x. ( B x. ( log ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 3, 1 | #P_mulcomd | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR /\ C e. CC ) -> ( B x. C ) = ( C x. B ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR /\ C e. CC ) -> ( ( B x. C ) x. ( log ` A ) ) = ( ( C x. B ) x. ( log ` A ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_rpcn | |- ( A e. RR+ -> A e. CC ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR /\ C e. CC ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 12 |  | #P_rpne0 | |- ( A e. RR+ -> A =/= 0 ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR /\ C e. CC ) -> A =/= 0 ) |
| 14 |  | #P_cxpef | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ A =/= 0 /\ B e. CC ) -> ( A ^c B ) = ( exp ` ( B x. ( log ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 15 | 11, 13, 3, 14 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR /\ C e. CC ) -> ( A ^c B ) = ( exp ` ( B x. ( log ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR /\ C e. CC ) -> ( log ` ( A ^c B ) ) = ( log ` ( exp ` ( B x. ( log ` A ) ) ) ) ) |
| 17 | 2, 5 | #P_remulcld | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR /\ C e. CC ) -> ( B x. ( log ` A ) ) e. RR ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_relogefd | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR /\ C e. CC ) -> ( log ` ( exp ` ( B x. ( log ` A ) ) ) ) = ( B x. ( log ` A ) ) ) |
| 19 | 16, 18 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR /\ C e. CC ) -> ( log ` ( A ^c B ) ) = ( B x. ( log ` A ) ) ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR /\ C e. CC ) -> ( C x. ( log ` ( A ^c B ) ) ) = ( C x. ( B x. ( log ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 21 | 7, 9, 20 | #P_3eqtr4d | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR /\ C e. CC ) -> ( ( B x. C ) x. ( log ` A ) ) = ( C x. ( log ` ( A ^c B ) ) ) ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR /\ C e. CC ) -> ( exp ` ( ( B x. C ) x. ( log ` A ) ) ) = ( exp ` ( C x. ( log ` ( A ^c B ) ) ) ) ) |

| 24 |  | #P_cxpef | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ A =/= 0 /\ ( B x. C ) e. CC ) -> ( A ^c ( B x. C ) ) = ( exp ` ( ( B x. C ) x. ( log ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 25 | 11, 13, 23, 24 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR /\ C e. CC ) -> ( A ^c ( B x. C ) ) = ( exp ` ( ( B x. C ) x. ( log ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 26 |  | #P_cxpcl | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( A ^c B ) e. CC ) |
| 27 | 11, 3, 26 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR /\ C e. CC ) -> ( A ^c B ) e. CC ) |

| 30 |  | #P_cxpef | |- ( ( ( A ^c B ) e. CC /\ ( A ^c B ) =/= 0 /\ C e. CC ) -> ( ( A ^c B ) ^c C ) = ( exp ` ( C x. ( log ` ( A ^c B ) ) ) ) ) |
| 31 | 27, 29, 1, 30 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR /\ C e. CC ) -> ( ( A ^c B ) ^c C ) = ( exp ` ( C x. ( log ` ( A ^c B ) ) ) ) ) |
| 32 | 22, 25, 31 | #P_3eqtr4d | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR /\ C e. CC ) -> ( A ^c ( B x. C ) ) = ( ( A ^c B ) ^c C ) ) |
